title: #92Noon! Guerin/Talkers/Potulny/Gleeman/Schefter
description: Wild GM Bill Guerin kicks off the show a couple days before the season starts, football talkers for an hour, Grant Potulny catch-up, Gleeman's weekly pitstop and Adam Schefter closes the show!
